quote_text: You can't keep blaming yourself. Just blame yourself once and move on.
It is possible to commit no mistakes and still lose. That is not weakness, that is life.
Sucking at something is the first step being sorta good at something.
The problem is not the problem. The problem is your attitude about the problem.
I'd trade it all for a little more.
Today me will live in the moment unless it's unpleasant in which case me will eat a cookie.
Never forget what you are, the rest of the world will not. Wear it like armor and it can never be used to hurt you.
Fear is the mind-killer.
Not everything is a lesson. Sometimes, you just fail.
I don't know how many years I got left on this earth so I'm gonna get real weird with it.
Luck favors the prepared, darling.

source_media: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story
quote_text: We have hope.  Rebellions are built on hope.
Wisdom comes from experience. Experience is often a result of lack of wisdom.
Nothing goes over my head. My reflexes are too fast. I would catch it.
I know a little about a lot of things.
If I'm not back in five minutes... just wait longer.

source_media: What We Do in the Shadows
quote_text: They would call me Nandor the Relentless because I would just never relent.
If you jump ship and let the a**holes steer, then you're part of the problem.
I wish I could, but I don't want to.
By all means, move at a glacial pace.
